Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing a gender balance in the port authority
Summary: Relates to establishing a gender balance in the port authority; requires members of the board of commissioners and any officers of the port authority be appointed in a manner which will ensure that women comprise approximately fifty percent of the membership of the board or as officers of the port authority.
LawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
LawCode: Amd Art 4, ยง1 of Chap 154 of 1921
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 154 of the laws of 1921, relating to the port authority of New York and New Jersey, in relation to establishing a gender balance in the port authority
